snippet.title: Sonic Stranded - SAGE 2020 Demo release!
snippet.description:
A 3D Sonic fan game with character switching like in Sonic Heroes, custom avatar like in Sonic Forces, classic-like physics combined with Adventure-like gameplay. This demo contains 2 stages which end with bosses, 6 characters including customizable one and 3 Wispons with different abilities. Demo is out, have fun.

Polskie tłumaczenie można włączyć w ustawieniach. 



Download here (Version 3.2):
https://mega.nz/file/GgtVgYYa#Q-9llBN0kIrzsRl8zJjr0qpIA4h1bqrKb4iabWJLLPE






Sonic Amateur Games Expo 2020 link:
https://www.sonicfangameshq.com/forums/showcase/sonic-stranded-demo-3-1.736/

Update 3.2:
- Added a new mini-stage. It's hidden somewhere in the second stage. It's not hard to get.
- Changed how Lost World gravity mode works...
- ... what broke Special Stage 6, so I made a new one in its place. Also, Special Stage 1 has been scaled down.
- Improved camera.
- Made the first boss easier.
- Made changes in level design. There are new bottom routes in the second stage.
- The end screen after collecting a Chaos Emerald now informs about collected Emeralds and ability to transform into Super Sonic.
- Now you can crouch on rails and there is notification about rail switching (rail switching was there all along!)
- Fixed lots of bugs. Including inability to switch characters for keyboard users.
- Changed default keyboard controls.
- Added out of bounds secret messages, like in previous demos. 

Update 3.1: 
- Fixed some bugs
- Changed music during second boss
- Enemies in the second stage are now stylized



This game was formerly called Sonic Liquid Survival.


Trailer music: Tobu - Higher: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=blA7epJJaR4
